last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: The puzzle pieces of two cases years apart finally fit together, leading the detectives to startling conclusions about a senior government official.

name: Young Wallander
overview: An incendiary hate crime stirs civil unrest, fast-tracking rookie cop Kurt Wallander to detective in this origin story for the popular character.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Rookie cop Kurt Wallander stumbles into a hate crime in his own neighborhood. As he hunts the killer, the incident fuels anti-immigration anger.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Promoted to detective over his best friend, Reza, Kurt joins Hemberg on the case. Clues lead them to a notorious smuggler and a popular nightclub.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Kurt interviews illegal immigrants enrolled in a program funded by Gustav Munck, and soon finds a link between a pregnant refugee and the killer.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Hemberg orders Kurt to take some time off after the assassination of their chief suspect. The public considers the case closed but Kurt keeps probing.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Suspicious of Gustav's ties to the case, Kurt jeopardizes his romance with Mona by confronting the billionaire at a black-tie, Munck family affair.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Kurt, Rask and Hemberg try to connect their new suspect to a shipment of plastic explosive — and determine where and when the bomb will go off.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: After he considers leaving law enforcement, Kurt is assigned to identify the victim in a standard hit-and-run case that turns out to be anything but.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The death of Elias Fager goes public thanks to a leak that infuriates new superintendent Osei. Reza reveals his lingering bitterness toward Kurt.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Internal Affairs asks hard questions about Rask's interrogation of Elias eight years ago. Kurt realizes an eyewitness isn't telling the whole truth.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Following another murder, Rask is taken off the case by Osei. Kurt begins working with a new partner to follow a trail that leads them into the past.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Reza develops a theory about the night of the murder that casts suspicion on someone uncomfortably close by — but feels that Kurt is holding him back.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The puzzle pieces of two cases years apart finally fit together, leading the detectives to startling conclusions about a senior government official.
